message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its true value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $11,500 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,250 for the product. Can you consider that?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I can't go as low as $10,250. I can do $10,750, and that's my final offer.
I understand you're trying to be fair, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. That's the lowest I can go.
